attributes.action: LOBBY THE EU FOR INWARD INVESTMENT IN ENGLAND FOR ITS ROADS, RAIL LINKS AND THE IMPLEMENTATION OF TRAMS IN THE SOUTH OF ENGLAND.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE PAY TO THE EU MILLIONS A DAY - TIME TO HAVE SOME OF IT BACK AND SEE SOME INWARD INVESTMENT TO OUR HARD PRESSED TAX PAYERS

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
